response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its high value and importance to you, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial arrangement. I am offering the product to you for $14,000. This price reflects the significant savings compared to the market value of $15,000, while still ensuring a fair return for us. I understand the importance of this product to you and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 14000}
